articles.author: Catherine Bosley and Richard Henderson
articles.title: Asian Stocks Under Pressure After Blowout US Jobs: Markets Wrap - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: (Bloomberg) -- Stocks and bonds slid in Asia following Friday’s robust US payroll data, while the pound extended last week’s slump amid concern over the UK’s...
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) -- Stocks and bonds slid in Asia following Fridays robust US payroll data, while the pound extended last weeks slump amid concern over the UKs stretched public finances.
